page.title: 20TRANSPORT-PROPOSED TUNNEL
page.content: DUE TO THE INCREASED{TRAFFIC {CONGESTION}IN SALTASH,THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES HAVE PROPOSED BUILDING A {ROAD TUNNEL}UNDER SALTASH LINKING THE {TAMAR BRIDGE}WITH THE MAIN{A38}JUST WEST OF SALTASH.HERE ARE THE VIEWS OF SOME LOCAL RESIDENTS. "SOME PEOPLE LIVING NEAR THE ROAD WILL BE UPSET BECAUSE OF THE NOISE." "IT WILL MAKE IT EASIER AND QUICKER TO GET TO WORK BUT IT MIGHT LEAD TO LOTS OF ACCIDENTS IN THE SUMMER." "THE EXISTING BOTTLENECK IS GOING TO MOVE FURTHER INTO CORNWALL AND IF ANOTHER BOTTLENECK DOES APPEAR,WILL THEY SUGGEST ANOTHER TUNNEL?" "IN MY FAMILY EVERYBODY AGREES;THE NEW ROAD SERVES NO USEFUL PURPOSE.WHILE THE BRIDGE REMAINS A TWO LANE SYSTEM WITH TOLLS,IT CAN ONLY SERVE AS A BOTTLENECK TO FAST FLOWING TRAFFIC IN AND OUT OF CORNWALL."
